name: Marie Pappas
role: Head of the NCR military police

topics.response_text: So you're the one that saved President Kimball. Damn glad to have you on our side.

topics.topic_text: What is happening on the Strip?
topics.response_text: More of the usual. We're keeping an eye on the troopers to make sure they don't do anything stupid.

topics.topic_text: I'd like to know more about you.
topics.response_text: Not much to tell. Keeping the troopers in line and monitoring the Strip keeps me busy. It's my job and I'm going to do it well.

topics.topic_text: What can you tell me about the Ambassador?
topics.response_text: Crocker isn't too bad. He mostly stays in his office now. If you have any questions about the Embassy you should ask him. He'll talk your ear off.
Private Erwin... he's starting to get a thick file here with all his troublemaking.

topics.topic_text: I'd like to report a murder at Gomorrah.
topics.response_text: Murder? What kind of Murder? Do you have any proof?
Okay, this is a very serious accusation. Please be sure to bring me something concrete.

topics.topic_text: I found a dead girl in Gomorrah.
topics.response_text: Well that's something, but I can't go in there without proof of foul play.
These are terrifying. Do you have any idea who the man is speaking on this tape?
Well come back here when you can. I'd like to take care of this as soon as possible.

topics.topic_text: No, but I'll find out for you.
topics.response_text: Come back here as soon as you do, I'd like to see this asshole behind bars.

topics.topic_text: It is a guy named Clanden.
topics.response_text: Clanden? Okay, I'll send some troops over there to bring him in.

description:
Marie Pappas is a 38 year-old Caucasian Female.

Captain Marie Pappas is the head officer of the NCR military police serving at the NCR Embassy in 2281. As the highest-ranking MP in the Mojave, she oversees all NCR law enforcement operations on the New Vegas Strip. Due to the delicate political situation, Pappas is the only NCR soldier permitted to carry a firearm within the city limits, a testament to the NCR's commitment to maintaining order while respecting the sovereignty of Mr. House's territory.

Marie Pappas's Personality: Disciplined, professional, and by-the-book, Captain Pappas takes her duties very seriously. She has a no-nonsense approach to law enforcement and expects the same level of commitment from her subordinates. While she maintains a formal demeanor, she possesses a strong sense of justice and will go to great lengths to ensure that NCR interests are protected and that the laws are upheld, even in the chaotic environment of New Vegas.

Marie Pappas's Backstory: Born and raised in the NCR, Marie Pappas joined the army at a young age and quickly distinguished herself with her sharp tactical mind and unwavering dedication to duty. She served with distinction in several border skirmishes before transferring to the military police, where her leadership qualities became apparent. After a decade of exemplary service, she was selected to lead the NCR's military police contingent in New Vegas, a position that carries both prestige and significant responsibility in the tense diplomatic climate between the NCR and Mr. House.
